definitions.definition: Any of the many fragile insects of the order Ephemeroptera that develop in fresh water and live very briefly as winged adults .
examples: While some animals take months to reproduce, mayfly need just one perfect day.

definitions.definition: Characterized by a short duration; short-lived .

main_definition: Any of the many fragile insects of the order Ephemeroptera that develop in fresh water and live very briefly as winged adults .
secondary_definitions: ( attributive , figurative ) Characterized by a short duration; short-lived .
